articles.title: ‘Bridgerton’ Season 3 Gets An Unfortunate Release Date - Forbes
articles.description: This is Bridgerton's season 3 release date, which seems like it's further away than it should be. You'll be waiting a while into 2024.
articles.content:
Bridgerton
Netflix
Every week, my wife asks me if I know when Bridgerton season 3 is coming out, since I do this for a living. Every week I say no. Well, this week, I finally have an answer for her… [+2935 chars]
